a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: After the golden age: unemployment and inflation in
Unit 17 'The Great Depression, golden age, and global financial crisis’ Section 17.6 'The end of golden age' in The CORE Team,
Note: The series shown are unweighted averages for 16 OECD countries. CC-BY-ND-NC
